wordGroup: flee from vt. 从……逃出来

sentences.en: He was caught trying to flee the country.
sentences.cn: 他试图逃离该国时被抓住了。

sentences.en: For an instant, Barney was tempted to flee.
sentences.cn: 那一瞬间，巴尼很想逃走。

sentences.en: Many refugees have been forced to flee their homeland.
sentences.cn: 很多难民被迫逃离了祖国。
